verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w finished|strong="G5055"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G5128"\w* \w sayings|strong="G3056"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G3101"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*,

\wj  \+w Ye know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w after|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w two|strong="G1417"\+w* \+w days|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1096"\+w* \+add the feast of\+add* \+w the passover|strong="G3957"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w is betrayed|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w be crucified|strong="G4717"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* assembled \w together|strong="G4863"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* of the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w palace|strong="G0833"\w* of the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*, who was \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Caiaphas|strong="G2533"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w consulted|strong="G4823"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might \w take|strong="G2902"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* by \w subtilty|strong="G1388"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w kill|strong="G0615"\w* \add him\add*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Not|strong="G3361"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* \add day\add*, \w lest|strong="G2443"\w* there \w be|strong="G1096"\w* an \w uproar|strong="G2351"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

¶ \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1096"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Bethany|strong="G0963"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w* of \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* the \w leper|strong="G3015"\w*,

There came \w unto|strong="G4334"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* an alabaster \w box|strong="G0211"\w* \w of|strong="G3464"\w* very \w precious|strong="G0927"\w* \w ointment|strong="G3464"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* poured \w it|strong="G2708"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w*, as he \w sat|strong="G0345"\w* \add at meat\add*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1492"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \add it\add*, they had \w indignation|strong="G0023"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w To|strong="G1519"\w* what \w purpose|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w waste|strong="G0684"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w ointment|strong="G3464"\w* \w might|strong="G1410"\w* have been \w sold|strong="G4097"\w* for \w much|strong="G4183"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to the \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w understood|strong="G1097"\w* \add it\add*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w trouble|strong="G2873"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G3930"\+w* \+w the woman|strong="G1135"\+w*? \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w she hath wrought|strong="G2038"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w good|strong="G2570"\+w* \+w work|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w upon|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w the poor|strong="G4434"\+w* \+w always|strong="G3842"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G1438"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w* \+w ye have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w always|strong="G3842"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For in that|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w she|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w hath poured|strong="G0906"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w ointment|strong="G3464"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w body|strong="G4983"\+w*, \+w she did|strong="G4160"\+w* \+add it\+add* \+w for|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w burial|strong="G1779"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Wheresoever|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w gospel|strong="G2098"\+w* \+w shall be preached|strong="G2784"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2889"\+w* \+w whole|strong="G3650"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w*, \+add there\+add* \+w shall|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* this, \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w this woman|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w hath done|strong="G4160"\+w*, \+w be told|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w a memorial|strong="G3422"\+w* \+w of her|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*, \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w Iscariot|strong="G2469"\w*, \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w*,

And \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \add unto them\add*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* will \w ye|strong="G2309"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, and \w I|strong="G2504"\w* will \w deliver|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w covenanted|strong="G2476"\w* with \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G0694"\w* \w thirty|strong="G5144"\w* pieces of \w silver|strong="G0694"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* that \w time|strong="G5119"\w* he \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* \w opportunity|strong="G2120"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w betray|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \add day\add* of the feast of unleavened \w bread|strong="G0106"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* to \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Where|strong="G4226"\w* wilt thou \w that|strong="G2309"\w* we \w prepare|strong="G2090"\w* for \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* to \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Go|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the city|strong="G4172"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w such a man|strong="G1170"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w say|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w The Master|strong="G1320"\+w* \+w saith|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w My|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w time|strong="G2540"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w at hand|strong="G1451"\+w*; \+w I will keep|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w the passover|strong="G3957"\+w* \+w at|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w thy house|strong="G4571"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w disciples|strong="G3101"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w appointed|strong="G4929"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they made \w ready|strong="G2090"\w* the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1096"\w* the \w even|strong="G3798"\w* was \w come|strong="G1096"\w*, he sat \w down|strong="G0345"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2068"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* did \w eat|strong="G2068"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w shall betray|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w were|strong="G3076"\w* \w exceeding|strong="G4970"\w* \w sorrowful|strong="G3076"\w*, and \w began|strong="G0756"\w* every \w one|strong="G1538"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* to \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, is \w it|strong="G1510"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w He that dippeth|strong="G1686"\+w* \+add his\+add* \+w hand|strong="G5495"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the dish|strong="G5165"\+w*, \+w the same|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w shall betray|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w The Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w goeth|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w it is written|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w woe|strong="G3759"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w is betrayed|strong="G3860"\+w*! \+w it had been|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w good|strong="G2570"\+w* \+w for|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w he|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w had|strong="G1080"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w been born|strong="G1080"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w*, which \w betrayed|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Master|strong="G4461"\w*, is \w it|strong="G1510"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w*? He \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w hast said|strong="G2036"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G2068"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were \w eating|strong="G2068"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \add it\add*, and \w brake|strong="G2806"\w* \add it\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \add it\add* to the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Take|strong="G2983"\+w*, \+w eat|strong="G5315"\+w*; \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w body|strong="G4983"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w took|strong="G2983"\w* the \w cup|strong="G4221"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* gave \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w*, and \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \add it\add* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Drink ye|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*;\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w blood|strong="G0129"\+w* \+w of the|strong="G1242"\+w* \+w new|strong="G2537"\+w* \+w testament|strong="G1242"\+w*, \+w which is shed|strong="G1632"\+w* \+w for|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the remission|strong="G0859"\+w* \+w of sins|strong="G0266"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w I will|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w drink|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w henceforth|strong="G0737"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G1081"\+w* \+w of the vine|strong="G0288"\+w*, \+w until|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w I drink|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w new|strong="G2537"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father’s|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w*.\wj*
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they had sung an \w hymn|strong="G5214"\w*, they went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* of \w Olives|strong="G1636"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w All|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w shall be offended|strong="G4624"\+w* \+w because of|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1698"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w night|strong="G3571"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w it is written|strong="G1125"\+w*, \+w I will smite|strong="G3960"\+w* \+w the shepherd|strong="G4166"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the sheep|strong="G4263"\+w* \+w of the flock|strong="G4167"\+w* \+w shall be scattered abroad|strong="G1287"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w after|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w I|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w am risen again|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w I will go before|strong="G4254"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Galilee|strong="G1056"\+w*.\wj*

\w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Though|strong="G1487"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add* shall be \w offended|strong="G4624"\w* because \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \add yet\add* \w will|strong="G4624"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w never|strong="G3763"\w* be \w offended|strong="G4624"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w night|strong="G3571"\+w*, \+w before|strong="G4250"\+w* \+w the cock|strong="G0220"\+w* \+w crow|strong="G5455"\+w*, \+w thou shalt deny|strong="G0533"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w thrice|strong="G5151"\+w*.\wj*

\w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Though|strong="G2579"\w* \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w should|strong="G1163"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2579"\w* will \w I|strong="G0533"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w deny|strong="G0533"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*. \w Likewise|strong="G3668"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* a \w place|strong="G5564"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Gethsemane|strong="G1068"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \wj  \+w Sit ye|strong="G2523"\+w* \+w here|strong="G0847"\+w*, \+w while|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w I go|strong="G0565"\+w* \+w and pray|strong="G4336"\+w* \+w yonder|strong="G1563"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he took with \w him|strong="G3880"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G5207"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Zebedee|strong="G2199"\w*, and \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to be \w sorrowful|strong="G3076"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* very \w heavy|strong="G0085"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* saith \w he|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w My|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w soul|strong="G5590"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w exceeding sorrowful|strong="G4036"\+w*, \+w even unto|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w death|strong="G2288"\+w*: \+w tarry ye|strong="G3306"\+w* \+w here|strong="G5602"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w watch|strong="G1127"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w went|strong="G4281"\w* a little \w further|strong="G3397"\w*, and \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w*, and \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w O|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w it be|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w possible|strong="G1415"\+w*, \+w let|strong="G3928"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w cup|strong="G4221"\+w* \+w pass|strong="G3928"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*: \+w nevertheless|strong="G4133"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2309"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+add wilt\+add*.\wj*
